product_name: Feedback Sports Velo Column Bike Stand
long_description: This space-saving Velo Column Bike Stand from Feedback Sports holds 2 bikes up off the floor in a stable and secure manner. Aluminum column has 2 specially engineered support arms with soft molded cradles to protect frames. Spring loaded column holds 2 bikes, and arms can be independently adjusted in height to conform to all types of bicycle frame configurations. Feedback Sports Velo Column Bike Stand is adjustable from 7 - 10 ft.; adapter included for open joist ceiling applications.
short_description: This space-saving Velo Column Bike Stand from Feedback Sports holds 2 bikes up off the floor in a stable and secure manner.
